content.icerik: Nourishing & Hydrating Body Lotion Developed for dry skin, this fast absorbing body lotion includes apricot extract and apricot seed oil, Vitamin A & E, which ensures effective protection against free radicals and erases the traces of time. Its formula enriched with Shea nut butter nourishes and relaxes the skin, giving it the moisture it needs. Peptamide-6 in its content increases skin firmness. This light perfumed body lotion leaves a smooth, silky feeling on the skin and improves its elasticity.
